rules.build:
TIMEZONES="africa antarctica asia australasia europe northamerica southamerica etcetera factory backward systemv pacificnew"
cd $XPACK_BUILD_DIR
for zone in $TIMEZONES; do \ echo "Generating zone files for ${zone}..." /usr/sbin/zic -d tzgen -L leapseconds -y yearistype.sh ${zone} ; \ done
echo "Generating posixrules..." /usr/sbin/zic -d tzgen -p America/New_York
